summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Profile page performance and error handling fixes. Backend /api/profile/bundle endpoint working perfectly with match enrichment and favorites fix. Frontend Profile page loads under 2 seconds and displays all sections correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Retry button may not fully reload content after API recovery

passed_tests: Backend: /api/profile/bundle returns predictions with match enrichment (Parma Calcio 1913 vs Cagliari Calcio)
Backend: /api/profile/bundle returns favorites list with FC Barcelona and Real Madrid CF
Backend: /api/profile/bundle returns friends leaderboard with correct structure
Frontend: Profile page loads within 2 seconds (1.15s performance requirement met)
Frontend: Recent Activity section shows prediction entries with match names
Frontend: Favorite Teams section shows team names (FC Barcelona, Real Madrid CF)
Frontend: Stats show correct counts (3 Predictions, 0 Correct, 0 Wrong, Points)
Frontend: Achievements show 1/6 unlocked (First Prediction unlocked)
Frontend: Performance section shows 0% Win Rate with 3 Pending
Frontend: My Leaderboard section shows 'Your rank: #1'
Frontend: Error state shows 'Failed to load profile' with 'Try Again' button
